alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Nolan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:44PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nolan and southwestern Fisher Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 743 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roscoe, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roscoe, Champion, Wastella, I-20 Near The Nolan- Mitchell County Line and Us-84 Near The Nolan-Fisher County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 229 and 239. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
